quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
author: Aesop

quote: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
author: Mark Twain

quote: You cannot do kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Carry out a random act of kindness, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.
author: Princess Diana

quote: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Remember there’s no such thing as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Treat everyone with respect and kindness. Period. No exceptions.
author: Kiana Tom

quote: What wisdom can you find that is greater than kindness?
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Do things for people not because of who they are or what they do in return, but because of who you are.
author: Harold S. Kushner

quote: Kindness is the light that dissolves all walls between souls, families, and nations.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Always try to be a little kinder than is necessary.
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: Kindness is a gift everyone can afford to give.
author: Unknown

quote: A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Kindness is like snow. It beautifies everything it covers.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: The simplest acts of kindness are by far more powerful than a thousand heads bowing in prayer.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Kindness begins with the understanding that we all struggle.
author: Charles Glassman

quote: Kind hearts are the gardens, kind thoughts are the roots, kind words are the blossoms. Kind deeds are the fruits.
author: Kirpal Singh

quote: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for kindness.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: How beautiful a day can be when kindness touches it!
author: George Elliston

quote: If you can be anything, be kind.
author: Unknown

quote: To err on the side of kindness is never an error.
author: Liz Armbruster

quote: Kindness makes you the most beautiful person in the world, no matter what you look like.
author: Unknown

quote: Kindness is the golden chain by which society is bound together.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Kindness can become its own motive. We are made kind by being kind.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: The best portion of a good man’s life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: To kindness and love, the things we need most.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: The fragrance always stays in the hand that gives the rose.
author: Hada Bejar

quote: Tenderness and kindness are not signs of weakness, but manifestations of strength.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Sometimes it’s better to be kind than to be right.
author: Unknown

quote: Be kinder than necessary, for everyone you meet is fighting some kind of battle.
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: Act with kindness, but do not expect gratitude.
author: Confucius

quote: Forget injuries; never forget kindness.
author: Confucius

quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Do your little bit of good where you are; it’s those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
author: Edith Wharton

quote: Real generosity is doing something nice for someone who will never find out.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: When words are both true and kind, they can change the world.
author: Buddha

quote: We think too much and feel too little. More than machinery, we need humanity. More than cleverness, we need kindness and gentleness.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Kindness is free. Sprinkle it everywhere.
author: Unknown

quote: The ideals which have lighted my way, and time after time have given me new courage to face life cheerfully, have been Kindness, Beauty and Truth.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
author: John Holmes

quote: How do we change the world? One random act of kindness at a time.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: Kindness is the sunshine in which virtue grows.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Kindness is the oil that takes the friction out of life.
author: Anonymous

quote: Kindness is the greatest wisdom.
author: Anonymous

quote: Kindness is the only service that will stand the storm of life and not wash out.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Kindness is a passport that opens doors and fashions friends. It softens hearts and molds relationships that can last lifetimes.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Kindness is a language the dumb can speak and the deaf can hear and understand.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: Kindness is the only investment that never fails.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Kindness is a mark of faith, and whoever is not kind has no faith.
author: Prophet Muhammad

quote: Kindness is the key to peace and harmony in family and society.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Kindness is the light that dissolves all walls between souls, families, and nations.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Kindness is the only investment that never fails.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Kindness is the mark we leave on the world.
author: Saint Basil

author: Mark Twain

author: Henry David Thoreau
